articles.title: A Starry Night With Ranbir Kapoor, Malaika Arora, Arjun Kapoor And Others - NDTV
articles.description: Ranbir Kapoor looked dapper in a tuxedo at an award show recently. At the event, Malaika Arora and Arjun Kapoor stunned in matching outfits. Karan Kundrra and Tejasswi Prakash also posed stylishly for the cameras.

articles.title: Watching Persuasion as a Jane Austen fan: Sense and sensibility sacrificed to sass - The Indian Express
articles.description: It is a truth universally acknowledged that female leads must be saucy and sexy. Thus, the sweet, shy, strong Anne Elliot turns into a gorgeous being who drinks constantly, makes sexual innuendos, and is oh-so-trite!
